item.description: Goethe - institute Boston 170 beacon str , Boston $ 10, students , $5, German stage presents: VOltare & FRederic : a life in letter, commissioned in honor of FRederick II ' s 300 th birthday, VOltaire and FRederick : A life in letters is overview of the pen - pal friendship betWeen these two great thinkers that spanned almost half century . The play is made up of selected letter exchange between the great FRench-European PHilosepher and the ROyal PRince ( and later KIng) of PRussia. Conceived by DEtlef GErickle -SChonhagen , directed by GUy BEn- AHaron , tel 1-617-262-6050 ( sorry , typed from my I pad) , hopefully see you there ! Maia 781-718-6203

group.name: The Boston Euro Social Meetup Group
